definition: word/statement/speech/lyrics/CL:組|组[zu3],個|个[ge4]/a form of lyric poetry, flourishing in the Song dynasty 宋朝|宋朝[Song4 chao2]/CL:首[shou3]
strip/item/article/clause (of law or treaty)/classifier for long thin things (ribbon, river, road, trousers etc)

sentences.english: The headwords in this dictionary are in bold type.
sentences.chinese: 本词典的词条用的是粗体字。

sentences.english: If the task publishers had breached the entries listed tasks will probably face legal sanctions.
sentences.chinese: 若发布任务者违反词条列，将可能面对法律的制裁。

sentences.english: See also the Muggle Encyclopedia entry for the Wye River.
sentences.chinese: 参见《麻瓜百科全书》里关于瓦伊河的词条。

sentences.english: Unable to add entry to AutoCorrect because there is insufficient memory.
sentences.chinese: 内存不足，无法添加自动更正词条。

sentences.english: This is an error rate of around 5%, about the same as in many text-entry activities.
sentences.chinese: 这是误差率的大约5%，与在许多文本词条活动相同。

sentences.english: This autocorrect entry does not exist.
sentences.chinese: 此自动更正词条不存在。

sentences.english: Start with the question of accuracy.
sentences.chinese: 先说词条的准确性问题。

sentences.english: All the entry words are given parts of speech and explanations about the meaning and usage.
sentences.chinese: 各词条都标注词类，按意义和用法分项详加说明。

sentences.english: Yes… my electronic dictionary is quite superb in terms of the quality and quantity of its entries.
sentences.chinese: 我的电子辞典中的词条无论质量还是数量都是一流的。

sentences.english: It includes more entries today than ever.
sentences.chinese: 今天的词条数目超过了以往任何时候。

sentences.english: My electronic dictionary is quite superb in terms of the quality and quantity of its entries.
sentences.chinese: 我的电子辞典中的词条无论质量还是数量都是一流的。

sentences.english: A big dictionary often gives the derivation of words.
sentences.chinese: 大辞典往往提供词条的词源。

sentences.english: Information in the dictionary is given in entries, arranged in alphabetical order of headwords .
sentences.chinese: 本词典的词条按词目的字母顺序排列。

sentences.english: According to the clew information of Baidu, this vocabulary entry is updated at 28 days.
sentences.chinese: 根据百度的提示信息，此词条更新于28日。

sentences.english: Under the key word "Yi Fu" (clothing) is a picture of the pants and jacket known the world over as a Mao suit.
sentences.chinese: 在“衣服”词条下是一张中山装的照片。

sentences.english: Unable to add because AutoCorrect entry is too long.
sentences.chinese: “自动图文集”词条过长，无法添加。

definition: clauses and sub-clauses (in formal document)/entry (in a dictionary, encyclopedia etc)
universal/encyclopedic/abbr. for 百科全書|百科全书[bai3 ke1 quan2 shu1]
dictionary/also written 辭典|辞典[ci2 dian3]/CL:部[bu4],本[ben3]
dictionary/also written 詞典|词典[ci2 dian3]/CL:本[ben3],部[bu4]
word/statement/speech/lyrics/CL:組|组[zu3],個|个[ge4]/a form of lyric poetry, flourishing in the Song dynasty 宋朝|宋朝[Song4 chao2]/CL:首[shou3]
vocabulary/list of words (e.g. for language teaching purposes)/word
variant of 詞彙|词汇[ci2 hui4]
